text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
――I can't believe I'm with you on Christmas too. 
I'm sick of it.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
That's my line. Ambassador… Don't hold me back, 
okay? I'm going to be cool.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Alright, alright. That's my line! Practice for 
the performance starts tomorrow, so you should 
get some sleep.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
(I can't help but complain, but…… I know she's 
the one who decides when to do it. So―)

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
(Sometimes it pisses me off, but I'm really 
counting on her. With her, I should be able to――)

text_block_list.name: Both
text_block_list.text: (It'll probably work…) (It'll work…)

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
――We talked about performing before 
the light-up ceremony. I'll have you 
guys dance 'Girls 'Legend U'.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Oh! That's great!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
The teacher thought of a choreography and song 
for the two of us to dance together. Brian and I 
will demonstrate first. Please watch.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Ohhhh…!

text_block_list.name: Both
text_block_list.text: Brian, you're so cool! You're so cool!

text_block_list.name: Both
text_block_list.text: Hm?

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Well, it's not that hard, is it? You'll learn 
soon enough. Let's start practicing.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: ――Sorry I'm late! Vodka and Scarlet-chan are……

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: The stage. It's a sight to behold.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: Huh? Oh…

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Hey, you're too forward! Get back a little more!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
It'd be cooler if it was a little over the top 
here! Come out more!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Aaah, geez…! It's always like this!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text:
Amazing… Even though we're clearly fighting, the 
choreography is so neat!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: …It's almost creepy.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Don't say that. They match 
each other by competing.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: …Wow. So this is what it means to be unique.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
That was a wonderful combination of the two. 
There shouldn't be any problem with the lighting 
ceremony now. I guess that's to be expected.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Thank you so much! ♪

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: I told you, it's better to overdo it!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Don't get carried away!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
…I don't think there's any problem with the 
fight. Those two are fine, so I'll discuss the 
details of the day with them.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
You're doing all the meetings with the 
management on your own, aren't you? I practiced 
choreography with them until late at night.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: What is that?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: …No. Call me next time you have a meeting.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: ………What's with her?

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: ♪ What a wonderful combination…

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
So, about the lighting… I thought it'd 
be nice if there was a monitor so the 
audience could see everything.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Yes, I've already submitted a request for that. 
I'll arrange for a dedicated camera crew on the 
day of, and on that premise…

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
(Oh, she's talking about the 
event? Then I should…)

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text:
*sigh* Scarlet-chan… You really are wonderful! 
You're just too beautiful to be Airgrove-senpai!

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text:
Yep, yep! They're both top-notch flowers, and 
the vice president and honor student are the 
perfect combination.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
(She's totally different from Airgrove-senpai! 
Everyone doesn't know what she really is, so I 
can't say that……)

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: ……well, it might look good on you……I don't know.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
So this is where you were. It's 
about time for the meeting.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Oh, sorry! I was just thinking…

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
…I'll support you, but I don't intend to act as 
a charm, either. Return that pained expression 
to normal in five minutes.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: …! I'm sorry…!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
(Wait, vodka? Don't tell me she's trying to 
cause Brian trouble?! I have to go!)

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl C
text_block_list.text:
Hey, I've been thinking for a while, 
but… seeing those two together is so 
cool. It's a little… outlawish!

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl D
text_block_list.text:
Hey! Woolfe's with Bryan, so she's kinda 
worried… Maybe those two are the best pair.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
(…Huh?! She's not worried. 
She's just not thinking!)

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: …It does look good, but…
